casebody.data:
R.J. REYNOLDS TOBACCO COMPANY, et al., petitioners,
v.
Mary Faricy PARDUE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of John N. Faricy. No. 18-621. Supreme Court of the United States Feb. 25, 2019. Petition for writ of certiorari to the District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District denied. Justice KAVANAUGH took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
